mapper.insert: INSERT INTO seller (username, password, name, email, phone, registration_number, store_name) VALUES (#{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, #{registrationNumber}, #{storeName})
mapper.select: SELECT seller_id, username, name, email, phone, registration_number, store_name, created_datetime, updated_datetime FROM seller WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId}
SELECT EXISTS(SELECT 1 FROM seller WHERE seller_id = #{sellerId})
